cmput301f13t10.presenter

Class AnnotationPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301f13t10.presenter.AnnotationPresenter

  • public class AnnotationPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
    Presenter that relays data between the annotation model and the annotation view. This class also allows you to store images in the annotation media.
    Author:
    Aly-khan Jamal
